interface.name: libs_domtrans_ldconfig
interface.summary: Execute ldconfig in the ldconfig domain.

interface.name: libs_run_ldconfig
interface.summary: Execute ldconfig in the ldconfig domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to allow the ldconfig domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the ldconfig domain to use.

interface.name: libs_use_ld_so
interface.summary: Use the dynamic link/loader for automatic loading of shared libraries.

interface.name: libs_legacy_use_ld_so
interface.summary: Use the dynamic link/loader for automatic loading of shared libraries with legacy support.

interface.name: libs_exec_ld_so
interface.summary: Execute the dynamic link/loader in the caller's domain.

interface.name: libs_manage_ld_so
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the dynamic link/loader.

interface.name: libs_relabel_ld_so
interface.summary: Relabel to and from the type used for the dynamic link/loader.

interface.name: libs_rw_ld_so_cache
interface.summary: Modify the dynamic link/loader's cached listing of shared libraries.

interface.name: libs_search_lib
interface.summary: Search library directories.

interface.name: libs_dontaudit_write_lib_dirs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to write to library directories.

desc.p: Do not audit attempts to write to library directories. Typically this is used to quiet attempts to recompile python byte code.

interface.name: libs_manage_lib_dirs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete library directories.

interface.name: libs_read_lib_files
interface.summary: Read files in the library directories, such as static libraries.

interface.name: libs_exec_lib_files
interface.summary: Execute library scripts in the caller domain.

interface.name: libs_use_lib_files
interface.summary: Load and execute functions from generic lib files as shared libraries.

interface.name: libs_manage_lib_files
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete generic files in library directories.

interface.name: libs_relabelto_lib_files
interface.summary: Relabel files to the type used in library directories.

interface.name: libs_relabel_lib_files
interface.summary: Relabel to and from the type used for generic lib files.

interface.name: libs_delete_lib_symlinks
interface.summary: Delete generic symlinks in library directories.

interface.name: libs_manage_shared_libs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete shared libraries.

interface.name: libs_use_shared_libs
interface.summary: Load and execute functions from shared libraries.

interface.name: libs_legacy_use_shared_libs
interface.summary: Load and execute functions from shared libraries, with legacy support.

interface.name: libs_relabel_shared_libs
interface.summary: Relabel to and from the type used for shared libraries.

interface.name: files_lib_filetrans_shared_lib
interface.summary: Create an object in lib directories, with the shared libraries type using a type transition.

param.name: object
param.summary: The object class of the object being created.
